horoscopes.title: Aries Weekly Horoscope Starting January 25
content: For Aries Sun, Moon rising signs, this is a special week, as Neptune, the god of the ocean will enter your sign, and that will surely reshape your identity, direction, and how others perceive you in the coming days. This planet is going to be here for so many years, so this transit will bring solid developments in an individual and collective mode for all the Aries natives. You will get new roles in personal and social life, and you will take the initiative to take up them as you may not feel the old one authentic. This transit also will make you set some boundaries through real situations, and you will be highly intuitive.

Multiple planets are moving through your eleventh house, so you are eagerly looking for new team collaborations. If you are a job seeker, then this is a good time to apply in various companies, as there are many chances to get a new job. These changes will be evident in the life of those who work in IT, finance, research or space related organisations. There will be team ventures, new discussions, online and offline meetings for making more money. You will also get enough support from your elders and friends too.

On the twenty-seventh, warrior of the zodiac, Mars will conjunct Pluto in Aquarius, so there will be some powerful developments in friendships and social circles. There are chances for arguments with your team mates, so make sure you don’t try to impose your ideas on them. Throughout this week, there will be multiple opportunities to learn new things, work in multiple projects with your creative skills too. During this week, you will explore new methods to make more money, but please stay away from instant money making plans. Since Neptune is moving through your sign, minor physical issues can also come up.

horoscopes.title: Taurus Weekly Horoscope Starting January 25
content: This is a highly transformative period for Taurus rising, Sun and Moon signs, as Neptune will enter your twelfth house, and it will be there for a long time. The twelfth house indicates your inner world, so you will be drawn to spiritual world, detachment and you will not like anything to do with external pressure. You will choose intuition over logic, as some situation will arise which will show the secrets. There will be a change in the sleep pattern, and you will see a lot of dreams, which will signal you about the future. You will also get associated with institutions like hospitals, retreat centers and hospitals.

Multiple planets will be moving through the air sign of Aquarius , so your tenth house of career, and public image will be the central focus for the next twenty plus days. There will be some changes in the role, you can expect promotion related discussions, or leadership opportunities coming up in the next few days. You can also expect important meetings, evaluations, and decisions with authority figures, and that will shape your reputation and career path. This is a sensitive time, as there are malefics too, so you have to be very careful at whatever you do in professional capacity.

Your home, and personal life also will be going through changes, and you will be more assertive, reactive and driven to how you present yourself, and you will take the lead roles in the private life as well. People will notice your presence, and conflicts will arise if boundaries are not clear, so please don’t hesitate to keep healthy boundaries. You will have minor health issues like head ache or flue, which is the part of this transit. There will be important events at home like family functions, relocations, renovations or changes in the domestic responsibilities.

horoscopes.title: Gemini Weekly Horoscope Starting January 25
content: For Gemini rising, Sun and Moon signs, the transit Neptune will enter your eleventh house, so it will reshape your friendships, social networks, and long-term dreams, and it will surely happen in a very evident manner. You will be working with large groups, which can be majorly from international locations. These events will bring new team ventures in personal and professional domain. Some issues in the friendships or collaborative projects will end, and you will get the real picture of the situation. This transit will help you to find new groups, which can give you larger visions, but make sure the groups you choose are genuine.

Multiple planets are moving through the ninth house, so travel, education and spiritual matters will produce concrete outcomes. There will be many opportunities for long trips or foreign travel, relocation or international collaborations. You will also try to enrol in a course, or try to learn something on your own. There will be some chances to write an exam, or attend an international workshop online or offline during this time. Those who were trying to get a publisher, there will be someone coming up willing to publish your work. Since Malefics are also the part of this transit, you may have to argue with your mentors or fatherly figures.

Your third house also will be highly active as the Sun, Mars, Venus and Mercury will be impacting through an aspect. There will be an interest in spiritual matters, so you may try to attend a retreat or go for pilgrimages. Travelling is shown here, and you can also expect events like transfer, relocation or department change as well. You will have important discussions with your siblings, neighbours, classmates or close contacts, but there are chances for confrontation too. This is a complex week, as there will be some kind of instability.

horoscopes.title: Cancer Weekly Horoscope Starting January 25
content: The transit Neptune will enter your tenth house of career, and it will be here for a long term, so this is a very good time to set some standards for your professional life. There can be some uncertainties during the initial days of this transit, but as it advances, you will find better roles. You must follow the inputs of your managers, and don’t do anything on your own risk. This transit will open doors to creative, spiritual, healing or compassion related career path, so those who working in these domains will get new opportunities. You will also find realistic path towards your career success.

The financial matters will be of utmost importance as multiple planets will be moving through the eighth house, so you need to be very careful with money. Those who have joint accounts will have to be careful, as you should inform all your financial situation with your partner. There will be some discussions regarding loans, tax, and PF, and you will restructure them. You may also get some approvals for loans, or some financial instruments, or there will be contractual changes. You will have sudden financial needs, so you have to be prepared for that.

Mars will be aspecting your eleventh house, so your friends, and long term associations will be very important. There will be more interactions with friends, groups or networks and it can happen online or offline too. You will be invited to join new groups, and they will be there for some time, and this can also be like a support group. You will be goal driven, so you will not hesitate to take bold steps towards future plans, and they will be an asset to you in the near future. However, Mars can make you very aggressive, that can bring arguments in the friendships.

horoscopes.title: Leo Weekly Horoscope Starting January 25
content: Neptune will move into the fire sign of Aries, and it will be there for many years, and it will impact the ninth house of belief systems. You may lose interest in traditional beliefs, question spiritual and cultural ideas, and you will not hesitate to break these to form new one. There are chances for some confusion about your educational plans, legal matters or foreign collaborations. There will be some instant changes in the travel plans, but there will be journeys to nourish your soul. You will be interested in writing, teaching, publishing and there will be sure interaction with an international community.

Multiple planets will be moving through the air sign of Aquarius, so your relationships, partnerships, and one to one interaction will be very important. If you are already moving through a heart break, this is a very complex time for you and don’t take any final decision during this week. For single Leo rising, Sun and Moon signs, these planets will open up new relationships, so make sure you are very choosy, about what kind of partner you want. These transits will also bring official agreements, contracts and proposals, so this is a very important phase for professionals and business owners too.

Mars will aspect the tenth house of career, so you will be taking up new decisions, which will lead to bold decisions like applying for new roles, change in the domain, launching new projects, or challenging your managers. There will be some competitive projects, and you have to be careful while preparing for that, as you may miss some details. This transit also will give you new responsibilities at work as well, so get ready to take up such responsibilities. This is a bit complex transit as Mars will aspect your sign, so there will be minor health issues too.

horoscopes.title: Virgo Weekly Horoscope Starting January 25
content: Transit Neptune will enter Aries, and this planet will be here for many years, so, there will gradual but slow events surrounding your financial matters. There will be some opportunities to repay big loans, so use this transit to make better repayment plans. Some of the financial plans will be confusing for you, so make sure you take the support of a financial expert, otherwise, you will again fall into some traps. Please avoid any kind of unauthorised financial plans too, as they will look very attractive outside, but there will be hidden charges. This Neptune will bring spiritual interest too.

Multiple planets are moving through the sixth house of work, health, and daily routine. There will be a sure increase in the work, and that can make you a bit tired. The workplace dynamics with coworkers will be a problem, as there are chances for arguments, so make sure you focus on your work than discussing anything like office politics. New job opportunities can come up, and you have rescheduled your work pattern. Your diet also has to be good, as these planets will impact the lower abdomen. You will choose new diet, or new workout pattern, which will help you to improve the health.

Mars will impact the ninth house of faith and belief system, so you will be interested in learning various philosophies and theology. Mars is not a spiritual planet, so you will be learning all these to criticise them, but you should avoid arguments, as different people have different perspective. You will be learning new technical courses, or take some certifications, or go for specialised training too. You may also plan for long trips, but there will be immigration related issues, so you need to handle them wisely. There will be opportunities for writing, publishing and foreign collaborations too.

horoscopes.title: Libra Weekly Horoscope Starting January 25
content: Neptune, the god of oceans and illusions will enter Aries this week, and it will remain here for many years. This Neptune has the power to reshape your relationships, by erasing the illusions. For single Libra rising, Sun and Moon signs, this is a very important phase for relationships, as they will realise the benefit of a realistic partner than someone with fantasies. Some of your connections will fade, while other relationships will transform in the next few years. You will try to set up healthy relationships around you despite personal or business. The seventh house also indicates career, so you will get long term projects as well.

Multiple planets are moving through the fifth house, so you will be meeting a lot of people, for personal and business purpose. This is a time to invest in own ventures, as the fifth house indicates creative talents, so you will find my outlets to display your creative skills. However, make sure you don’t spend too much for the promotions as there will some risks associated as well. For single Librans, this is an ideal time to date, but this is not the time to give or take commitments. You will also spend more time with young groups, and parents will take major decisions regarding their children.

Mars will aspect the eighth house, so there will be some financial concerns. You must have a healthy financial habit, otherwise you will have a lot of financial liabilities. Financial matters involving debts, loans, taxes, or joint resources will come up, and you will try to settle them. Mars itself is the planet for financial liabilities, so there are chances for sudden expenses, so you should be prepared for that. This aspect also indicates power struggles in the relationships, so you need to control the aggressive nature.

horoscopes.title: Scorpio Weekly Horoscope Starting January 25
content: Transit Neptune will enter Aries, which rules your sixth house, and that shows for the next few years. This is a complex transit, so you have to be very careful, as the work load will increase, and you will feel the burden. Some projects may take some time to bring the desired results too. There are chances for confusion around responsibilities, unclear expectations about coworkers, or last time go-live kind of situation. Your health also is very important as Neptune will trigger your lower abdomen area. You will take up new health care pattern like new routine, new diet, or new medication.

Multiple planets will be impacting the fourth house, so there will be a lot of events at home. There will be some changes in the living space, such as moving, renovations, or reorganising the space. This transit will produce mixed results, as both malefics and benefics are present in this transit. You can expect some family functions so, there will be a chance to meet your relatives and friends too. Since the Sun and Mars are also here, so you will be a bit aggressive, and you may also will go for some short trips. This transit will also bring some concerns for the elderly people , so they need more attention and care.

Mars will aspect the eleventh house, so you will also try to have more interactions with your friends and team mates. You will try to assert your role within a community, take leadership in a team, or actively pursue your goals forcefully. During this week, you will get new opportunities to join a team, and it can be online or offline. There will be collective projects, and you will make some money in the near future. However, all these are possible only if you are having peaceful conversation with your team mates.

horoscopes.title: Sagittarius Weekly Horoscope Starting January 25
content: There will be more fun and happiness as Neptune will enter your fifth house during this week. Neptune indicates creativity, so this is a very good time for those who work in the creative domain. They will very good ideas which will surely capture the public attention, and that will help them in getting new projects too. Love life may go through complex pattern, so you should not be in a hurry to take the relationship to the next level. You will also join new teams, you will get new friends, and they will be mostly a young crowd.

Multiple planets are moving through the third house, so, there will be a lot of multiple projects, so you will have to run around a lot. The third house indicates communication, so you will have a lot of communication like messages, emails, conversations and team activities. You and siblings will have important conversation, and they will have some issues, which need immediate solution. You will also get some updates about your pending projects as well. This is a very good time to start learning new courses, and you will surely get some benefit from them. Short travels, transfers and department changes also will be the part of this week.

Mars will aspect the sixth house, and this will bring some changes in the work and office. Mars is a natural malefic, so this aspect will bring arguments with your colleagues, so make sure you are not the part of any conflicts. This is a very good transit to attend sports events and competitive events like interviews or debates. You need to have some patience in these events, otherwise you will not be focussed. The digestive system also will be a bit sensitive, so you need to have a good diet too.

horoscopes.title: Capricorn Weekly Horoscope Starting January 25
content: Transit Neptune will move into Aries, which will impact your fourth house of home and family, and Neptune will be here for a long time. Neptune is the planet for confusion, so you may have some challenges at home regarding home management. There will be an emotional atmosphere at home, and you can expect family functions, discussions regarding ancestral property as well. This is a very sensitive time as your elders will need more support from you. There will be some discussions regarding real estate deals, renovation and other family property. Neptune is the planet for illusions so, please make sure you don’t take any hasty real deals.

Multiple planets are moving through the air sign of Aquarius, so you will have some concerns about money, but there will be gains too. The Sun, Mars, Mercury and Venus are the part of this transit, so there will be gains as well as expenses. The good news is the job seekers will have the closest opportunity to get a new job. This possibility is active for the next thirty plus days, so job seekers should prepare their resume and apply wherever they can. You will also start upskilling which will surely contribute to your job search.

Mars will aspect the fifth house, so there will some arguments in the team activities, so you should control your arguments. Otherwise, these arguments will block your progress, especially if you are a businessman. The fifth house indicates creativity, and you will get opportunities to display and promote your work, and people will appreciate it. You will also interact with a younger community, and this will be very motivating for all. Parents will take crucial decisions about children, and children will take up new projects. This is a good time for dating, but not a great time to take or give commitments.

horoscopes.title: Aquarius Weekly Horoscope Starting January 25
content: Multiple planets are moving through your sign, so your personal life will be very important for the next twenty plus days. The Sun, Mars, Mercury and Venus are in your sign, so significant changes will be coming up in your life. New people will enter and old ones will disappear during this time. This is the solar return time for Aquarius, so this a time to shed your old skin and embrace the new, so you will even try an image makeover. You will get new assignments like a new job offer or a new business offer too, so use this transit wisely.

These planets will aspect the seventh house, so you will attend some social gatherings. The seventh house indicates public space, so, you will be visible more in the social platforms. Those who work in fashion, modelling and business will have more work, and there are chances to get new contracts, and agreements. Job seekers also will have the closest opportunity to get a job, or even you will attend interviews. There will be parties, weddings or business meets where you meet new people. However, you should not be oversharing anything about you with anyone, as they can use these things against you.

Mars will aspect the fourth house, and the eighth house, so you will naturally think about a home loan or a vehicle loan. Mars itself is the indicator of land, so this is a possible week for land related deals, so you can expect, renovation, construction or even buying a piece of land. Mars is a separative planet, so you will face some complex situation at home like arguments with your family members, and there may not be any serious issue. Please control your over enthusiastic nature, otherwise there will frequent clashes with your elders.

horoscopes.title: Pisces Weekly Horoscope Starting January 25
content: This is the time to be silent as multiple planets are moving through the twelfth house of isolation and detachment. This is the time to stay silent, as you need more strength when the Sun comes to your sign. You will have the stronger need for rest, and restoration, so don’t force yourself to take up complex tasks which need public approval. There is nothing wrong in taking temporary breaks, and every human need such things. You will spend more time in spiritual matters, some among you will go for past life regression, meditation or therapy, which will surely recharge your batteries.

These planets will aspect the sixth house, so you will have a lot of work, and focus on health and your daily routine. Your job responsibilities will increase, and new task will come up, or changes in your role can come up. There will be meetings, deadlines, or performance expectations, which can be a bit tough during this phase. You will have interactions with your colleagues, but there are chances for arguments too. You will be attending interviews and other competitive events like sports. You have to take care of your health as well, as the digestive system will be active.

Mars will aspect the third house, so there will be a lot of tasks, and it can be majorly from communication, travel and studies. You will have to be alert, as there are chances to miss some of the projects. There will be opportunities to write, teach and publish your work, and that will be a very positive event during this week. Short travels, and transfers also will be the part of this transit too. However, you will have minor health issues, especially related to your neck and shoulder area, so if you already have some issues, then you have to be careful.
